# Selkirk Hardwood

> Professional hardwood floor refinishing, installation, and repair in Spokane, WA. NWFA certified, locally owned since 2015, with a 3-year finish warranty on every project.

## Services
- Hardwood Floor Refinishing ($3–$8/sq ft)
- Dustless Floor Sanding ($3.50–$5/sq ft)
- Custom Staining & Color Matching ($4–$9/sq ft)
- Commercial Floor Refinishing ($2.50–$6/sq ft)
- Hardwood Floor Repair ($500–$2,000/project)
- New Hardwood Floor Installation ($6–$15/sq ft)

## Key Differentiators
- NWFA (National Wood Flooring Association) Certified Professionals
- Dustless HEPA-filtered sanding system captures 99% of dust
- Bona Mega ONE commercial-grade waterborne polyurethane finish
- 40+ custom stain colors with on-site test patches
- 3-year written finish warranty
- EPA Lead-Safe Certified for pre-1978 homes
- $2M general liability insurance
- 400+ projects completed, 4.9/5 average rating (187 reviews)

## Service Area
Spokane, WA and surrounding Inland Northwest communities including:
- South Hill, North Side, Browne's Addition, Garland District
- Manito/Comstock, Lincoln Heights, Indian Trail, Five Mile Prairie
- Spokane Valley, Liberty Lake, Cheney, Medical Lake
- Airway Heights, Mead, Deer Park
- Post Falls & Coeur d'Alene (by appointment)

## Business Hours
- Monday–Friday: 7:00 AM – 6:00 PM
- Saturday: 8:00 AM – 2:00 PM
- Sunday: Closed
